name: azure-resource-lock
description: Locks or Unlocks a specified Resource or Resource Group
author: JamieTaffurelli

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to authenticate as

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select whether to lock or unlock resources

inputs.name: LockLevel
inputs.label: Lock Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the type of lock to apply

inputs.name: LockName
inputs.label: Lock Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the lock to create or delete. If left blank for Unlock it will search for all locks at that scope

inputs.name: ResourceType
inputs.label: Resource Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of Resource to search for locks for (e.g Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks)

inputs.name: Skip
inputs.label: Skip Existing Locks
inputs.helpMarkDown: If a lock is found with the same name then lock creation will be skipped
